title: IN2 Supermart — Add footer credit line

requirements.summary: Add a visible “Made by Aditya Sharma” credit line to the footer bottom section while preserving existing copyright and caffeine.ai referral link.
acceptanceCriteria: On all pages, the footer bottom area shows the text "Made by Aditya Sharma" in English.
The existing footer content (including the © year/IN2 Supermart text and the caffeine.ai link) remains present and functional.
The added credit is responsive and does not break layout on mobile or desktop.

file_operations.description: Update the bottom footer section to render an additional visible line reading "Made by Aditya Sharma" beneath (or alongside, responsively) the existing copyright/referral row. Keep the existing caffeine.ai referral link intact, including its URL and tracking query parameters, and do not remove or alter the current copyright text.
